description: This file defines a custom logging utility for a Python project, including custom handlers, loggers, and utility functions for managing logging levels and output formatting.

classes.name: ColoredRichHandler
classes.description: A custom RichHandler that adds color styling based on source_type and log level.

classes.name: AgnoLogger
classes.description: A custom logger class extending Python's logging.Logger with overridden debug and info methods for additional formatting.

methods.name: build_logger
methods.description: Creates and configures a custom logger with RichHandler and specific formatting.

methods.name: center_header
methods.description: Creates a centered header string with a specified symbol, adjusting for terminal width.

methods.name: use_team_logger
methods.description: Switches the global logger to the team logger.

methods.name: use_agent_logger
methods.description: Switches the global logger to the agent logger.

methods.name: set_log_level_to_debug
methods.description: Sets the logging level to DEBUG for a specified source type.

methods.name: set_log_level_to_info
methods.description: Sets the logging level to INFO for a specified source type.

methods.name: log_debug
methods.description: Logs a debug message if debugging is enabled and level criteria are met.
